statements: SELECT * FROM production_line_performance_data ORDER BY production_line_id DESC;
SELECT production_rate, efficiency_rate FROM production_line_performance_data WHERE production_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM production_line_performance_data WHERE time_stamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT production_line_id, SUM(production_rate) AS total_production FROM production_line_performance_data GROUP BY production_line_id;
SELECT AVG(efficiency_rate) AS avg_efficiency FROM production_line_performance_data;
SELECT * FROM production_line_performance_data WHERE production_rate > 100 ORDER BY time_stamp ASC;
SELECT production_line_id, efficiency_rate FROM production_line_performance_data WHERE production_rate < 50 AND efficiency_rate > 0.7;
SELECT production_line_id, time_stamp, production_rate FROM production_line_performance_data WHERE time_stamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY production_rate DESC, time_stamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_line_performance_data WHERE production_rate BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND efficiency_rate >= 0.6 ORDER BY efficiency_rate DESC, time_stamp DESC;
SELECT production_line_id, production_rate, efficiency_rate FROM production_line_performance_data WHERE production_rate != 75 AND production_line_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY production_line_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_line_performance;
SELECT production_line_id, efficiency FROM production_line_performance WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT temperature, pressure, speed FROM real_time_data WHERE production_line_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM real_time_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT production_line_id, downtime_minutes FROM production_line_performance WHERE running_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM production_line_performance WHERE efficiency > 0.9 AND running_status = TRUE
SELECT production_line_id, efficiency, downtime_minutes FROM production_line_performance ORDER BY efficiency DESC, downtime_minutes ASC
SELECT timestamp, temperature, pressure FROM real_time_data WHERE production_line_id = 1 AND speed > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT production_line_id, SUM(downtime_minutes) AS total_downtime FROM production_line_performance GROUP BY production_line_id HAVING total_downtime > 60

SELECT p.production_line_id, p.efficiency, r.temperature FROM production_line_performance p JOIN real_time_data r ON p.production_line_id = r.production_line_id WHERE p.efficiency < 0.8 AND r.temperature > 70 ORDER BY p.production_line_id ASC
SELECT id, product_id, production_time, efficiency FROM production_line_performance;
SELECT product_name, product_type, creation_date FROM product_details;
SELECT data_id, timestamp, sensor_id, value FROM real_time_data;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_type, creation_date FROM product_details;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM real_time_data;
SELECT * FROM production_line_performance ORDER BY efficiency DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM product_details WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM real_time_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT product_name, SUM(efficiency) AS total_efficiency FROM production_line_performance JOIN product_details ON production_line_performance.product_id = product_details.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM real_time_data WHERE value > 100;
SELECT * FROM production_line_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT line_id, productivity FROM production_line_data WHERE productivity > 0.8;
SELECT description, action FROM production_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-05';
SELECT line_id, production_capacity, current_speed FROM production_line_info WHERE line_id = 5;
SELECT error_message, error_timestamp FROM production_errors ORDER BY error_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_line_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT line_id, productivity, efficiency FROM production_line_data WHERE productivity > 0.8 AND efficiency < 0.5;

SELECT pli.*, pld.productivity FROM production_line_info pli JOIN production_line_data pld ON pli.line_id = pld.line_id WHERE pld.productivity > 0.5 AND pld.efficiency < 0.8 ORDER BY pld.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_errors FROM production_errors WHERE error_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT pli.line_id, pli.production_capacity, COUNT(pe.id) AS error_count FROM production_line_info pli LEFT JOIN production_errors pe ON pli.line_id = pe.line_id GROUP BY pli.line_id, pli.production_capacity ORDER BY error_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionLinePerformance;
SELECT id, production_time FROM ProductionLinePerformance ORDER BY production_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM LineWorkers WHERE worker_id = 3;
SELECT supervisor_name, supervisor_id FROM LineSupervisors WHERE supervisor_id < 5;
SELECT machine_id, status FROM MachineStatus WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT production_time, efficiency FROM ProductionLinePerformance WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY production_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value, MIN(data_value) AS min_value FROM RealTimeData WHERE sensor_id = 101
SELECT worker_id, worker_name FROM LineWorkers WHERE worker_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT supervisor_id, supervisor_name FROM LineSupervisors ORDER BY supervisor_name ASC
SELECT machine_id, status FROM MachineStatus
